other_tests.procedure_name: CT GUIDED PLACEMENT OF PIGTAIL CATHETER
other_tests.findings: Significant fat stranding around the cecum and free fluid in the right lower quadrant. A rim enhancing 6.4 x 4.7 cm fluid collection containing multiple extraluminal foci of air is consistent with an abscess in the setting of a perforated appendix.

Cardiomegaly with left ventricular enlargement, right basilar atelectasis, small pleural effusion, stable 9.2 mm hypodensity likely a hemangioma, stable 11 mm hypodensity likely a hepatic cyst, normal pancreas and spleen, unchanged cortical irregularity at the inferior pole of the right kidney, significant fat stranding around the cecum, and a rim enhancing fluid collection consistent with an abscess.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Area of cortical irregularity on the right kidney is unchanged since previous CT.
